title: Machine Learning-Based Strategies for High-Strength Aluminum Alloy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic materials science, fundamental principles of alloy design, and foundational data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Learners complete short intensive courses on mobile platforms using digital devices, with project-based assessments measuring outcomes. They study analytical approaches to machine learning models for solving complex alloy design problems.

learning_goals: Learners can explain key performance metrics of aluminum alloys (strength, toughness, corrosion resistance) and design constraints
Learners can analyze the impact of alloying element characteristics (electronic structure, physical properties) on performance using machine learning models
Understanding synergistic effects of Ti, Cr, Zr micro-alloying elements and simulating multi-performance-optimized alloy designs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
